H0.text: What name is shared by the capital city of Newfoundland and the capital city of Antigua and Barbuda. Bridgetown

H1.text: What name is shared by the capital city of Newfoundland and the capital city of Antigua and Barbuda. Halifax

H2.text: What name is shared by the capital city of Newfoundland and the capital city of Antigua and Barbuda. Castries

H3.text: What name is shared by the capital city of Newfoundland and the capital city of Antigua and Barbuda. St.Johns

A4.text: While no law explicitly states St. John's is the island's capital, the city is home to the Government Complex in the Botanical Gardens neighbourhood, which is home to the High Court, the Office of the Prime Minister, and the Parliament Building.
